arts.ttl: European football: McTominay boosts Napoli title bid, Real Madrid sink Getafe
arts.sum: Midfielder nets winner in 1-0 victory at Torino Bellingham and Mbappé on target for Madrid Scott McTominay’s first-half goal earned leaders Napoli a 1-0 win at Torino as Antonio Conte’s side opened a four-point gap at the top of the Serie A standings. The Scotland midfielder found the net around the half-hour mark when he struck a shot powerfully inside the near post after receiving a precise pass from Khvicha Kvaratskhelia. Napoli move on to 32 points, with four teams level on 28 points: Atalanta, Lazio, Inter and Fiorentina. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Real Madrid 2-0 Getafe: Match report and talking points as Mbappe scores in victory

arts.ttl: Real Madrid Pulls Within One Point of Barcelona With Victory vs. Getafe
arts.sum: Real Madrid secured a comfortable 2–0 win over Getafe, keeping the pressure on Barcelona atop the La Liga standings.

arts.ttl: Mbappé and Bellingham respond to unhappy fans with goals in Real Madrid's 2-0 win over Getafe
arts.sum: Kylian Mbappé made some peace with Real Madrid’s fans by scoring in his team’s 2-0 win over Getafe in the Spanish league on Sunday. The win moved Madrid within a point of league leader Barcelona, which lost 2-1 to Las Palmas on Saturday.

arts.ttl: One Real Madrid star proved his many doubters wrong again vs Getafe

arts.ttl: Real Madrid 2-0 Getafe: Why was Jude Bellingham substituted at half time?
arts.sum: Real Madrid's Jude Bellingham was substituted at the interval of Sunday's La Liga clash with Getafe due to "a problem in his neck".
